name: One Mechanic to rule them all
name_original: One Mechanic to rule them all
description:
This Game was Built for Create Chester 2020

Story

In the year 2120 a new law was passed that only 1 person may be qualified as a mechanic. That person is you. This new job as brought riches and fame but also many jealous rivals all wanting to kill you and become the one mechanic themselves. The lack of jobs has driven some to try and earn money by being test subjects for new drugs and medicines, though in doing this the would be mechanics have started to lose their minds, now all in a deadly rage they are coming for you. 

Controls 

WASD to move

Mouse to control camera 

Survive as long as you can
